titleStmt.title: Playes written by the thrice noble, illustrious and excellent princess, the Lady Marchioness of Newcastle.
titleStmt.author: Newcastle, Margaret Cavendish, Duchess of, 1624?-1674.
Newcastle, William Cavendish, Duke of, 1592-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Warren, for John Martyn, James Allestry, and Tho. Dicas ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

Loves adventures -- The comedy named The several wits -- Youths glory, and deaths banquet -- The lady contemplation -- Wits cabal -- The unnatural tragedy -- The publick wooing -- The matrimonial trouble : a comedy -- Natures three daughters, beauty, love, and wit -- The religious -- The comical hash -- Bell in Campo -- A comedy of the apocriphal ladies -- The female academy.
